title: Just finished the monthly update for my pixel 3a and volume up is not working.
content:
After the monthly update that I just did i noticed that I can't raise up the volume from the side button. Only way to do it is to lower down from the button and manual slide it up.
The volume was okay before the update.
Does anyone else has encounter this issue with this last update?
Is not a big thing to raise it up manual but it's unusual and I really don't want to reset the phone to factory settings.
I tried resetting the phone and it's the same.
Thanks,
Radu
